Description: Company knowingly or willfully provided altered contracts to government auditors which concealed important information and delayed audit completion.
Agency: Interior Department Office of Natural Resources Revenue

Description: Company failed to report production on one well.
Agency: Interior Department Office of Natural Resources Revenue

Description: Citation Oil and Gas Corp. agreed to spend approximately $580,000 on new and upgraded spill prevention controls at its Cellers Ranch production field in Johnson County, Wyo., and pay a $280,000 penalty to resolve the government's claims for violations of the Clean Water Act.
Agency: Justice Department Environment and Natural Resources Division
Info Source: https://yosemite.epa.gov/opa/admpress.nsf/d0cf6618525a9efb85257359003fb69d/ccf38797cbc8034e85257538005e2f20!OpenDocument

Description: Citation Oil & Gas Corp. and its affiliates, Citation 2002 Investment Limited Partnership and Citation 2004 Investment Limited Partnership, agreed to pay $2.25 million to resolve allegations under the False Claims Act that they underpaid royalties owed on natural gas produced from federal lands in Wyoming.
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/opa/pr/citation-companies-agree-pay-225-million-settle-civil-false-claims-act-allegations
